title: Texting Tutor PT 2: Can We Help Her Stop Her Mom From Ruining This For Her Brother?
description:
You’re conflicted. But you just don’t KNOW how to approach your problem…especially if you’re not a confrontational person. So sometimes, you just need a little help addressing the situation – and that’s where we come in!
We’ll tell you what to text the person, line by line, and we’ll help you resolve the problem…but you have to PROMISE to write EXACTLY what we tell you to.
Kelly's mom wants to surprise her brother's family with a trip to Disney. Sounds exciting, right? Not in this case! Her brother has always wanted to be the one to take his family to Disney, so you can image how'd he feel if his mom beat him to the punch. Can he help her talk her mom out of this?
